content: The digital information in DNA is only part of a complex information-processing system, an advanced form of nanotechnology that mirrors and excels our own in its complexity, storage density, and logic of design.
translations: ita:Le informazioni digitali contenute nel DNA sono solo una parte di un complesso sistema di elaborazione delle informazion
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
